title: South of France Michelin-Starred Upgrade Escape
description: Experience the charms of the south of France with a gourmet food and wine escape at Domaine Riberach, a boutique property offering a one-of-a-kind experience where guests sleep in converted wine vats. Featuring a Michelin-starred restaurant and onsite winery, expect to sample some of the finest local produce with daily breakfast, a wine tasting and winery tour, local sweets and welcome drinks included in your package.

title: Gourmet Food and Wine Escape in South of France
